Tucson.MacArthur Building, Tucson: MacArthur Building, Tucson is a three-story, 22,661-square-foot building in downtown Tucson, Arizona. It was originally named the Hotel Heidel in 1907 and was remodeled into the MacArthur Hotel in 1944. The hotel included a restaurant, saloon and barbershop and was built to serve passengers arriving via the Southern Pacific Railroad Depot.
